name: The festival is approaching Find the most vibrant flowers to decorate You can combine them on the flower tree to collect them more easily
greetings: Hello do you feel happy today

name: Red flowers symbolize luck Clear obstacles to collect these valuable flowers
greetings: Hello how is your red flower collection going Are you facing any difficulties

name: A lot of flowers are needed to complete the beautiful garlands Free blocked flower tiles to collect more
greetings: Hello have you gathered enough flowers to make a garland

name: Purple flowers will make the festival even more colorful Use special items to break barriers and collect them
greetings: Hello do you like the new purple flowers you collected

name: White flowers symbolize purity Don’t forget to combine different flowers to collect more
greetings: Hello have you tried combining flowers to collect more

name: First choose the most beautiful ribbons Clear obstacles around to tie them easily
greetings: Hello have you found the most beautiful ribbons Are there any obstacles causing trouble

name: Red ribbons bring luck and prosperity Use support items to break obstacles and collect them
greetings: Hello have you gathered enough red ribbons Do they bring you luck

name: Ribbons will make the wreaths stand out Remove obstacles to tie them beautifully
greetings: Hello do you need help removing obstacles and tying the ribbons nicely

name: Golden ribbons will make your wreath shine more brightly Clear obstacles to collect them
greetings: Hello have you gathered enough golden ribbons Are you facing any difficulties

name: Make sure the ribbons are tied tightly so they don’t come loose Use special items to clear the area and collect more ribbons
greetings: Hello have you secured the ribbons properly Do you need any help

name: Start collecting dry wood to prepare for the bonfire night Combine wood pieces to gather them quickly
greetings: Hello have you collected enough wood The bonfire night is coming soon

name: Large wooden logs are needed to create a strong fire Clear obstacles to get them
greetings: Hello have you gathered enough large logs Are obstacles making it difficult

name: Be careful when picking up wood Don’t let thorns prick your hands Remove sharp obstacles to collect wood safely
greetings: Hello do you feel safe while collecting wood Be careful of sharp objects

name: These wooden logs will help us have a warm bonfire night Combine wood pieces to collect them more efficiently
greetings: Hello have you finished preparing wood for the bonfire night

name: Don’t forget to bring wood to the fire area You need to clear obstacles to transport them easily
greetings: Hello have you brought enough wood to the fire area Do you need any help

name: Use red flowers to create lucky wreaths Clear obstacles to craft beautiful wreaths
greetings: Hello do you feel excited today

name: Wreaths need to be tightly secured Use support items to break obstacles and complete them
greetings: Hello did you sleep well

name: Make wreaths carefully to bring good luck to everyone Remove surrounding obstacles to complete the task
greetings: Hello do you like the festive atmosphere

name: You can decorate the wreaths with sparkling ribbons Clear the area to complete the task easily
greetings: Hello does today feel special to you

name: Each wreath will be given to a resident attending the festival Clear obstacles to complete this task
greetings: Hello is there anything you are looking forward to today

name: Use white flowers to create beautiful floating lanterns Remove obstacles to collect them
greetings: Hello do you feel relaxed today

name: The floating lanterns will be released into the river on festival night Collect and arrange them perfectly
greetings: Hello do you enjoy watching floating lanterns

name: Make sure your lanterns don’t sink Clear obstacles to prevent damage
greetings: Hello do you feel comfortable today

name: We will release floating lanterns to wish for a bountiful harvest Remove obstacles to release them properly
greetings: Hello would you like to share something joyful

name: Don’t forget to place candles in the lanterns so they shine brightly on the river Use special items to break obstacles and complete the lanterns
greetings: Hello do you like the sparkling lights
